examples.example: 沿着这条路直走，你就会看到那座美丽的花园。

translate.english: Go straight along this road, and you will see that beautiful garden.

examples.example: 我们只要沿着这条大街直走，就能到达想去的地方。

translate.english: As long as we go straight along this street, we can reach the place we want to go.

examples.example: 他告诉我沿着这条小径直走，就能找到那处宁静的湖泊。

translate.english: He told me to go straight along this path, and then I can find that peaceful lake.
